messages.content: Hi, my name is Alice Johnson and I need help with my account. My email is alice.johnson@email.com
Hello! I'd be happy to help you with your account.
Patient record: Name: Bob Williams, DOB: 1985-03-22, SSN: 123-45-6789, Diagnosis: Type 2 Diabetes
Thank you for providing the patient information.
I need to update my payment info. Card number: 4532-8765-1234-5678, expires 12/26, CVV: 123
I can help you update your payment information securely.
Contact details: Dr. Sarah Martinez at smartinez@hospital.org or call (555) 987-6543. Address: 456 Oak Street, Boston, MA 02101
Your account has been created successfully.
